task.title: How-to-open-calculator-in-mobile
task.shortdesc: This task allows you to open the calculator application in mobile

context.p: You can use a calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful, when you need to quickly calculate some numbers. For example, if you have purchased a book for 5$ and you have given 10$, how much change should you expect? Answer is 10-5=5 $ change.

step.cmd: Navigate to the calculator application icon.

taskbody.result: The application starts. You are now ready to do the calculations.
